name: Jane’s mystery story
description:
Feel like a detective and investigate the mysterious events in the house:
- Make choices that will determine the end
- Build romantic relationships with characters
- Make friends or enemies
- Find the murder

New episodes every month!

You will play as a character named Jane. She lives the life of an ordinary high school student until strange things start to happen to her… 

Can Jane solve all the secrets, find love and herself? Everything depends only on you!

👇Play other games from Stacy Story Games👇
